metadata.title: Friday, 17th July, 2015
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    when the construction of a concrete slab at the Food Reserve Agency Depot in Kabompo District, which was abandoned, will be completed;
(b)    who the contractor for the project is;
(c)    what the total cost of the project is; and
(d)    how much money was paid to the contractor.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    when the construction of an airstrip in Luwingu District will commence; and
(b)    what has caused the delay in commencing the construction works.
(a)    how many dip tanks are earmarked for construction in Chadiza Parliamentary Constituency in 2015;
(b)    at which locations the dip tanks will be constructed; and
(c)    what the total cost of the projects is.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    how many students at the University of Zambia, Great East Road Campus, were provided with accommodation as of April, 2015;
(b)    how many students were not accommodated;
(c)    what measures have been taken to address the shortage of bed space at the institution; and
(d)    when the University will provide adequate accommodation to the students.

questions.minister: Minister of Agriculture and Livestock when the Government will facilitate the setting up of maize milling plants in provincial and district centres to ensure low prices of mealie meal.
